## ðŸ”’ Building Continuum - Chap 2 - Keys Not Accounts

This chapter explores the structural difference between accounts and keys â€” and why that distinction reshaped my thinking. Decentralization at the protocol layer does not automatically produce sovereignty at the user layer. â€œKeys, Not Accountsâ€ explains why identity must be possession-based rather than permission-based, and how that realization became a foundational boundary for Continuumâ€™s architecture.
